document.full_text: a jet carrying first lady michelle obama abandoned a landing approach outside washington to avoid another plane in an apparent mistake by air traffic controllers, u.s. aviation officials said on tuesday.
document.title: plane carrying michelle obama aborts landing near washington
lines_and_colors: a jet carrying first lady michelle obama abandoned a landing approach outside washington to avoid another plane in an apparent mistake by air traffic controllers, u.s. aviation officials said on tuesday.
